Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects.view.GVRView
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects.view.GVRFrameLayout
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects.view.GVRTextView
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects.view.GVRWebView
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects.GVRWebViewSceneObject
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.gearvrf.GVRContext.DEFAULT_PRIORITY
    use GVRAssetLoader.DEFAULT_PRIORITY instead
    org.gearvrf.GVRContext.DEFAULT_TEXTURE_PARAMETERS
    use GVRAssetLoader.getDefaultTextureParameters instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.gearvrf.GVRPicker.findObjects(GVRScene, float, float, float, float, float, float)
    use GVRPickedObject[] pickObjects
    org.gearvrf.GVRRenderData.getCullTest()
    Use getCullFace() instead.
    org.gearvrf.GVRColliderGroup.getEnable()
    use GVRComponent.isEnabled()
    org.gearvrf.GVRActivity.getForceMonoscopic() 
    org.gearvrf.GVRLODGroup.onDrawFrame(float) 
    org.gearvrf.asynchronous.GVRCompressedTextureLoader.Reader.readLong(int)
    Sniffers need to be very fast!
    org.gearvrf.GVRRenderData.setCullTest(boolean)
    Use setCullFace(GVRCullFaceEnum cullFace) instead. Set the GL_CULL_FACE option
    org.gearvrf.GVRActivity.setForceMonoscopic(boolean) 
    org.gearvrf.GVRRenderData.setShaderTemplate(Class<? extends GVRShaderTemplate>)
    does nothing currently, GVRShaderId now contains the shader template
    org.gearvrf.utility.VrAppSettings.setShowDebugLog(boolean) 
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects.GVRCameraSceneObject(GVRContext, float, float, Camera)
    This call does not ensure the activity lifecycle is correctly handled by the GVRCameraSceneObject. Use GVRCameraSceneObject.GVRCameraSceneObject(GVRContext, float, float) instead.
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects.GVRCameraSceneObject(GVRContext, GVRMesh, Camera)
    This call does not ensure the activity lifecycle is correctly handled by the GVRCameraSceneObject. Use GVRCameraSceneObject.GVRCameraSceneObject(GVRContext, GVRMesh) instead.
    org.gearvrf.animation.GVRMaterialAnimation(GVRHybridObject, float)
    Using this overload reduces 'constructor fan-out' and thus makes your life a bit easier - but at the cost of replacing compile-time type checking with run-time type checking, which is more expensive and can miss errors in code if you don't test every path through your code.
    org.gearvrf.animation.GVRTransformAnimation(GVRHybridObject, float)
    Using this overload reduces 'constructor fan-out' and thus makes your life a bit easier - but at the cost of replacing compile-time type checking with run-time type checking, which is more expensive and can miss errors in code if you don't test every path through your code.
